body.p:
Hickman Ky Decr 25th 1860
Gov Beriah McGoffin
Frankfort
Ky

Honl Sir at the last November term of the Fulton Equity and Criminal ^court^ Michael Ginney was tried and convicted of larceny the case is to my mind one plainly calling for Executive clemency The ^facts^ are truly set forth in a petition for his pardon which will be presented to your Excellency and call for consideration
You will doubtless comply with the wish of all who are acquainted with the facts of the case by pardoning him

Yrs very Respectfully
C, L, Randle
